text: Dariusz Grzesik (born 10 January 1966) is a retired Polish football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Piast Gliwice players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:Rozwój Katowice players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Poland international footballers
title: Dariusz Grzesik
